DOC.brief_title: Dispensing Study Assess Visual Performance Optimised Prototype Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , double-masked , crossover , bilateral wear , dispense clinical trial participant wear multiple prototype ( test ) commercial ( control ) lenses . Multiple prototype contact lens design assessed commercial control lenses study , design worn week . There minimum 1 night washout period lens design .
DOC.criteria: Able read comprehend English give inform consent demonstrate signing record inform consent . Be least 18 year old , male female . Willing comply wear clinical trial visit schedule direct Investigator . Have ocular health finding consider `` normal '' would prevent participant safely wear contact lens . Is correctable least 6/12 ( 20/40 ) good eye contact lenses . Be suitable willing wear contact lens . Any preexist ocular irritation , injury condition ( include infection disease ) cornea , conjunctiva eyelid would preclude contact lens fit safe wear contact lens . Any systemic disease adversely affect ocular health e.g . diabetes , Graves disease , auto immune diseases ankylose spondylitis , multiple sclerosis , Sjogrens syndrome systemic lupus erythematosus . Conditions systemic hypertension arthritis automatically exclude prospective participant . Use need concurrent category S3 ocular medication enrolment . Ocular medication prescribe course trial per standard optometric practice . Use need systemic medication topical medication may alter normal ocular finding / know affect participant 's ocular health / physiology contact lens performance either adverse beneficial manner enrolment and/or clinical trial . Note : Systemic antihistamine allow `` needed basis '' , provide use prophylactically trial least 24 hour clinical trial product use . Eye surgery within 12 week immediately prior enrolment trial . Previous corneal refractive surgery . Contraindications contact lens wear . Known allergy intolerance ingredient clinical trial product .
